note:
Heyo.
I work on servers and in/out/around computer related things. Occasionally stuff.
My hobbies are learning new servers/systems and gaming.
For tech related stuff, I enjoy working with Ansible and Docker/containers and in more recent years have been moving into entirely automation.
Gaming I go heavy on both RPG (non MMO) and logistics (factorio).
Finally, huge Linux and FOSS advocate and user, Corporation despiser, and Anarchist (via Non Violence).

Daily Linux distros; Arch, Alpine, Debian.
